description.narrative: In September 2015, the Municipality of Beira and the Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands (EKN) in Maputo signed MoUs for the further elaboration and implementation of several priority projects that were identified in the context of the Beira Masterplan 2035 (BMP). The Municipality (CMB) plays an important role in the efforts to meets the socio-economic and environmental development objectives. The mayor of Beira and the EKN agreed that a qualitative baseline assessment of the capacity in CMB would be conducted.For the qualitative assessment of CMB the Deloitte’s Organisation Maturity Model is used. The model originally defines 4 maturity levels (basic-, process-, system- and network orientation) of an organisation against 5 functional dimensions of organisation:• Strategy & Policy• Organisation & Process• Planning & Control• Information Systems• People & CultureConclusions: What in fact is lacking in Beira is the tactical level of organisation. The political leadership of CMB is strong, but the top management of the administrative organisation has a much more modest and reserved profile. The vast majority of the vereações do not represent a bottleneck for the Masterplan. But there is one vereação that does represent a bottleneck in this respect, the Vereação de Construção, Infraestruturas e Urbanização (VCIU), the domain of urbanisation and planning, infrastructure development and maintenance, where the cadastre and land registry is also based in. The speed of informal urbanisation is fast, so the situation is urgent. Therefore, the development of CMB in this area is urgent as well, and the question is whether it can keep pace with this development. CMB can possibly play a role as project owner/facilitator/enabler or shareholder in the more modest ones, but not in the more complicated ones, without support.Recommendations:Support CMB with respect to enhancing capabilities of planning, reporting and project management (the tactical organisation level).• Develop a leadership program for the top in connection with an English language course• Consider the appointment of a city manager• Define and realise a workplace baseline, at least for the city hall (main building)• Design an ICT strategy making use of mobile technology• Develop a plan for redesigning and rebuilding the cadastre and involve central government• Consider redesigning the vereação VCIU (CMB area for Construction Infrastructure and Urbanisation) and integrating it in the Land Development CompanyThis project is conducted in cooperation with: Kadaster International and Municipality of Beira (CMB).
